Package com.olegtoropoff.petcareappointment.service.user

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
com.olegtoropoff.petcareappointment.service.user.UserService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUserService
@Service public class UserService extends Object implements IUserService
Service layer for handling user-related operations. Provides functionality for registering, updating, retrieving, and managing user data, including roles, appointments, and reviews.

  • Method Details

    • register

      public UserDto register(RegistrationRequest request)
      Registers a new user based on the provided registration request. Validates the request and generates a verification token for the user.
      Specified by:
      register in interface IUserService
      Parameters:
      request - the registration request containing user details.
      Returns:
      the registered UserDto.

    • update

      @CacheEvict(value={"veterinarians_with_details","specializations"}, allEntries=true) public UserDto update(Long userId, UserUpdateRequest request)
      Updates an existing user's details.

      This method performs the following steps:

      • Validates the update request.
      • Finds the user by their ID.
      • Maps the update request to the existing user entity.
      • Saves the updated user to the database.
      • Converts the updated entity to a UserDto and returns it.

      Cache Eviction:

      • Clears `veterinarians_with_details` and `specializations` caches to ensure the updated user data is reflected.
      Specified by:
      update in interface IUserService
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user to update.
      request - the update request containing new user details.
      Returns:
      the updated UserDto with the modified user details.
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the user does not exist.
      IllegalArgumentException - if the update request is invalid.

    • findById

      public User findById(Long userId)
      Retrieves a user by their ID.
      Specified by:
      findById in interface IUserService
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the User with the specified ID.
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the user is not found.

    • deleteById

      @CacheEvict(value={"veterinarians_with_details","specializations"}, allEntries=true) public void deleteById(Long userId)
      Deletes a user by their ID along with all related data.

      This method performs the following operations:

      • Finds the user by their ID.
      • Deletes all reviews associated with the user.
      • Deletes all appointments linked to the user.
      • If the user has an associated photo, deletes the photo.
      • Removes the user from the database.

      Cache Eviction:

      • Clears `veterinarians_with_details` and `specializations` caches.
      Specified by:
      deleteById in interface IUserService
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user to delete.
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the user is not found.

    • getUserWithDetails

      public UserDto getUserWithDetails(Long userId)
      Retrieves a user along with their detailed information, including appointments, reviews, and photo URL.
      Specified by:
      getUserWithDetails in interface IUserService
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user to retrieve.
      Returns:
      a UserDto containing user details, including links to photos, appointments, and reviews.

    • populateUserReviewDetails

      public void populateUserReviewDetails(UserDto userDto, Long userId)
      Populates a UserDto with review details for the given user.

      This method:

      • Retrieves all reviews associated with the user.
      • Maps the reviews to ReviewDto objects.
      • Calculates and sets the average rating for the user (if they have reviews).
      • Sets the total number of reviewers.
      • Attaches the mapped reviews to the UserDto.
      Specified by:
      populateUserReviewDetails in interface IUserService
      Parameters:
      userDto - the UserDto to populate with review details.
      userId - the ID of the user whose review details should be populated.

    • countVeterinarians

      public long countVeterinarians()
      Counts the total number of users with the role of "VET".
      Specified by:
      countVeterinarians in interface IUserService
      Returns:
      the total count of veterinarians in the system.

      Specified by:

      the total count of patients in the system.

    • countAllUsers

      Specified by:
      countAllUsers in interface IUserService

    • aggregateUsersByMonthAndType

      public Map<String,Map<String,Long>> aggregateUsersByMonthAndType()
      Aggregates the count of users by their creation month and user type.
      Specified by:
      aggregateUsersByMonthAndType in interface IUserService
      Returns:
      a nested map where the key is the month, the value is another map where the key is the user type and the value is the count of users.

    • aggregateUsersByEnabledStatusAndType

      public Map<String,Map<String,Long>> aggregateUsersByEnabledStatusAndType()
      Aggregates the count of users by their enabled status and user type.
      Specified by:
      aggregateUsersByEnabledStatusAndType in interface IUserService
      Returns:
      a nested map where the key is the enabled status ("Enabled" or "Non-Enabled"), and the value is another map where the key is the user type and the value is the count of users.

    • lockUserAccount

      @CacheEvict(value="veterinarians_with_details", allEntries=true) public void lockUserAccount(Long userId)
      Locks the user's account by disabling their access.

      This method updates the user's `enabled` status to `false` in the database, effectively locking the account. The operation is typically used for administrative actions such as suspending a veterinarian.

      Cache Eviction: - Clears `veterinarians_with_details` cache to ensure that locked users do not appear in cached lists.

      Specified by:
      lockUserAccount in interface IUserService
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose account will be locked.

    • unLockUserAccount

      @CacheEvict(value="veterinarians_with_details", allEntries=true) public void unLockUserAccount(Long userId)
      Unlocks the user's account by enabling their access.

      This method updates the user's `enabled` status to `true` in the database, allowing them to regain access. This operation is typically used for reactivating suspended accounts.

      Cache Eviction: - Clears `veterinarians_with_details` cache to ensure that unlocked users are visible in cached lists.

      Specified by:
      unLockUserAccount in interface IUserService
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose account will be unlocked.

    • getPhotoUrlByUserId

      public String getPhotoUrlByUserId(Long userId)
      Retrieves the URL of the photo associated with a specific user. If the user has an associated photo, this method returns the URL of the photo stored in the S3 bucket. If the user does not have a photo, it returns null.
      Specified by:
      getPhotoUrlByUserId in interface IUserService
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose photo URL is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      the URL of the user's photo, or null if the user has no associated photo.
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the user with the specified ID does not exist.
